name: src/App.js

src/account/AccountStyles.js
src/account/EmailVerification/index.js
EmailVerification
description:
Email verification page
When the user click the activation link, the token will pass into this component.
VerifyEmail will transfer the token to the back-end for checking.
If success, the page will show a success message for 2s and direct to the login page.
If failed, the page will show a failure message and go to the home page.

import React from 'react'; import { Rate, InputNumber, Menu, Dropdown, Icon, } from 'antd'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import * as style from './booksPageCss'; // import PopularBooks from '../welcomePage/popularBooks'; const totalPrice = (unitPrice, number) => (unitPrice * number); const isInstock = number => (number ? 'In Stock.' : 'Out of Stock'); const menu = ( 1st menu item 2nd menu item 3rd menu item ); const dropdown = isLogin => (!isLogin ? ( You need to login ) : menu ); const booksPageComponent = props => (
  • {props.categaryName}
  • ›
  • {props.bookName}

Bookname: {props.bookName}

{`by: ${props.bookAuthor}(Author)`}
{props.bookReviews}customer reviews
{props.description}
Buy props.onbookNumberChange(value)} /> {`${totalPrice(props.bookSelectNumber, props.bookPrice)}$`}

{isInstock(props.stockNumber)}

Deliver to Australia

Related

{/* */}

Reviews

{ props.views.length !== [] ? ( props.views.map(item => (
{item.username}
{item.content}
{item.createDate} Already buied {item.content}
))) : null }
Rate: props.reviewStarChange(value)} value={props.submittedReviewStar} style={{ marginTop: '5px' }} />
Content:
props.reviewContentChange(event.target.value)} multiline fullWidth rows='4' style={{ backgroundColor: '#EEEEEE', marginTop: '5px', marginBottom: '12px' }} value={props.submittedReviewcontent} />
); export default booksPageComponent;

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "onlinecommerce",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "private": true,
  "dependencies": {
    "@material-ui/core": "^1.4.2",
    "@material-ui/icons": "^2.0.0",
    "@material/button": "^0.38.0",
    "antd": "^3.7.3",
    "axios": "^0.18.0",
    "bootstrap": "^4.1.3",
    "jwt-decode": "^2.2.0",
    "prop-types": "^15.6.2",
    "puppeteer": "^1.6.2",
    "react": "^16.4.1",
    "react-dom": "^16.4.1",
    "react-icons-kit": "^1.1.7",
    "react-redux": "^5.0.7",
    "react-router": "^4.3.1",
    "react-router-dom": "^4.3.1",
    "react-scripts": "1.1.4",
    "react-swipeable-views": "^0.12.16",
    "reactstrap": "^6.3.1",
    "redux": "^4.0.0",
    "redux-thunk": "^2.3.0"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "start": "react-scripts start",
    "build": "react-scripts build",
    "test": "jest",
    "eject": "react-scripts eject",
    "esdoc": "rm -rf ./esdocs && esdoc && open ./esdocs/index.html"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "esdoc": "1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "esdoc-importpath-plugin": "1.0.2",
    "esdoc-jsx-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "esdoc-react-plugin": "1.0.1",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^5.3.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^17.0.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^13.0.0",
    "eslint-loader": "^2.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.12.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.10.0"
  }
}
